Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Haynesville -- 5.04 Mills Continuation - TC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Haynesville, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), be authorized to continue to levy and collect a special tax of five and four hundredths (5.04) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Town (an estimated $40,780 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the streets and the sewerage system of the Town, said millage to represent a four hundredths of a mill (.04) increase over the 5 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2021 pursuant to an election held on November 2, 2010?

Race.SpecificTitle: Wards 2 and 3 Recreation District -- 5 Mills Continuation - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Wards 2 and 3 Recreation District Proposition
(Tax Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Claiborne Parish Wards 2 and 3 Recreation District of the Parish of Claiborne, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of five (5) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $213,800 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending with the year 2030, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the District's recreational facilities, for purchasing of necessary equipment and paying the cost of maintaining and supervising the recreational facilities?
